Used to create the main content boxes on pages in the Minecraft Wiki namespace. Note that sections inside <code>{{{content}}}</code> will not have edit links. If they need to be edited, the content can instead be enclosed by two transclusions of the template, using <code>open=1</code> and <code>close=1</code>. {{ #ifeq: {{FULLPAGENAME}} | Minecraft Wiki/style | [[Minecraft Wiki/style/editcopy|Suggest changes on the editcopy]] |  [{{fullurl:Special:ComparePages|page1={{urlencode:Minecraft Wiki/style}}&page2={{urlencode:Minecraft Wiki/style/editcopy}}}} Diff with main version of template] }}
